about.label: About Me
about.para1: I am a Hospitality & Management Researcher passionate about blending strategy, analytics, and technology to shape the future of service industries. My work bridges academic rigor with real-world hospitality challenges.
about.para2: With an international perspective and commitment to evidence-based practices, I aim to contribute to the evolution of hospitality standards—from boutique hotels to global tourism ecosystems.
